QuestData.Title: Descent
QuestData.Description:
What has transpired! That is to say, what has transpired?! Yes, that is the appropriate response, is it not?
I find our circumstances enthralling! Yet, tragic.
I prattle on... Yes, Lor'themar asked me to send you to him at once. He is in need of your expertise, $p.
I'll lower you down the falls safely. Good luck!
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Lor'themar Theron in Nazjatar.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet with Lor'themar Theron beneath the falls.
